basic.description:
Intermediate study in history and critical analysis, from early cinema to the tax-shelter boom and the institution of Telefilm Canada.
LEARNING HOURS    108 (36L;24Lb;48P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Canadian Film and Television to 1980

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.
